string.text: A 'Monolith' leader. It is best to stay away from him.
Military stalker. Well armed and very dangerous.
Army Spetsnaz. He is well equipped and tough.
Former Digger who leads raids the desolate labs and bunkers.
One of the participants of the deadly fights in the Arena.
Twin brother Zhorik. Bouncer at the Bar and Barkeep's bodyguard.
Twin brother Garik. A security guard at the entrance bar.
Set up the Bar. Well respected amount the stalkers.
Member of the Duty faction. More often off the wagon than on it.
Merry fellow and good-natured. Can't shoot worth a damn.
A mysterious stalker who knows a lot and sells information.
Head of counter-insurgency operations and k large packs of mutants.
He is a guard at the Arena. His past is known only to be troubled.
One of the 'Duty' founders and their leading idea monger at the same time.
Sergeant Plichko is a member of 'Duty and' is chief of security.
Unknown to most stalkers. Brain fell under the influence of the 'Scorcher'.
He is the leader of the 'Duty' faction, replaced Gen. Krylov who died.
One of the bandit leaders. Well armed and very dangerous.
One of Strelok's past companions and the oldest stalker in the Zone.
Unknown mercenary. Well armed and very dangerous.
A leader of a Mercenaries gang. Well armed and very dangerous.
An experienced stalker. A good map reader.
Experienced stalker. Keeps your eyes open.
Private contractor Armed Forces of Ukraine.
Rank Captain, with a long service in the Armed Forces of the Ukraine.
An intense man full of purpose. Secondary leader of the rookies.
Fox is an older experienced loner and the brother of Seriy.
A smart rookie that likes to explore. Wolf likes him.
He is credited with being the very first stalker.
Sergeant member Ukrainian Armed Forces in active service.
A very resourceful and lucky person. He is a survivor.
A corrupt and pompous soldier. Leader of a squad of Ukrainian soldiers.
Private contractor Armed Forces of Ukraine.
Unknown mercenary. Well armed and very dangerous.
A rookie loner that was found wounded near the Rookie village.
Wolf takes care of newbie stalkers at the rookie village in Cordon.
Hunted and traded from an early age. Was selling in kindergarden.
Enjoys some prestige among the bandits in the Zone. Borov's accomplice.
Rookie. Taking the first steps in the zone.
Demyan came into the Zone to hide from law enforcement agencies.
Rookie. Recently came to the zone.
Seriy is an experienced Stalker, and is affiliated with the Loner faction.
Commander of the special forces in 'Duty.' Well equipped.
Known throughout the Zone as a stool pigeon and SOB.
Unknown mercenary. Well armed and very dangerous.
Unknown mercenary. Apparently in the Zone recently.
Leader in faction 'Monolith'. It is best to stay away from him.
A veteran of the Zone. Knows the area like the back of his hand.
He is the commander of a group in 'Freedom' members at the 'Barrier'.
A security guard of 'Lukash' who the leader of the faction 'Freedom'.
A boozer and a brawler, but an excellent cook. Makes a mean pancake.
Talented mechanic. Allegedly able to make a tank out of a farm tractor.
Achieved a level of notoriety in the Zone. A guardian in Freedom.
Guardian of the faction 'Freedom'. Very loyal. Very dangerous.
'Freedom' trader known for his greed and intransigence.
Militant from faction 'Freedom'. Typically well equipped.
Stalker faction 'Monolith'. Was a member of Spetsnaz.
One of the stalkers that has been unlucky.
Commander of the 'Duty' faction. Very well equipped.
Fighter from faction 'Monolith'. He is well equipped.
A veteran of the Zone. Knows the area quite well. Very dangerous.
One of the stalkers that has been unlucky.
A researcher from the mobile science lab.
Freeman was a theoretical physicist and an expert on anomalous phenomena.
Untrustworthy, looter and murderer. Usually in over his head.
Has a Ph.D. in biology, main area of interest is new species of mutants.
A hero of the mercenaries. Has been riddled with bullets over time.
A field commander in 'Mercenaries' group called 'Dogs'. He is Wolf's brother.
Stalker Special Forces group 'Crystal'. Responsible for 'Monolith' safety.
Came to the Zone looking for adventure. Imitates comic characters.
Fierce, angry, rude, selfish, cruel, unfeeling, and cold. A really evil bandit.
A leader in faction. 'Duty'. Best to avoid him.
Militant from faction 'Duty'. Typically well equipped.
A ham, bootlicker, hypocrite and coward. Extremely ambitious and touchy.
Militant from faction 'Duty'. Typically well equipped.
He was once an official recruiter for the Ukrainian Security Service.
A phlegmatic who keeps his emotions to himself and always stays cool.
One of the stalkers with not much luck.
Military stalker. Well armed and very dangerous.
An old hermit that lives in Forest.
Stalker born under a lucky star. But his luck doesn't help anyone else.
A veteran of the Zone. Knows his way around quite well. Very dangerous.
Experienced smuggler. For a long time traded in Africa and South America.
Diodorus is a preacher and is a veteran of the war in Afghanistan.
Formerly a mechanic at the 'KholodMach' plant. A simple stern man.
Former a military stalker, a lieutenant colonel from mainland troops.
Rookie. Only been in the Zone for a month.
He is 20 years old. Lost everything and everyone in the 'Mainland'.
A former 'Spetsnaz Black Beret'. He is a lone wolf.
A student from a Physics Department, earned five degrees.
Sparrow is 27 years old. Seriously far-sighted. Can be quite vile.
Leshiy came to the Zone as a young idealist.
He is one of the guards at the Freedom base in Army Depots.
One of the stalkers that has been unlucky.
One of the stalkers that has been unlucky.
One of the stalkers that has been unlucky.
The leader of the bandits. Nicknames are Hog and Piggy.
Shaggy (aka: Serega) was a member of the 'Duty' faction.
A professor of genetics, leader of some ecologists.
Another scientist in Yantar and assistant to Professor Sakharov.
Freelancer whos actions are tied to his employer's money rather than ideals.
Duty commander at southern checkpoint on the way to the Bar from Landfill.
Shchukar is Fairy's grandfather who lives in Wolf's Lair.
Experienced female stalker who lives in Wolf's Lair with here grandfather.
Used to be a hair dresser on the Mainland.
Usually hangs out in Wolf's Lair. Has some experience with computers.
Commander of a group of military stalkers.
Klenov a former representative of the 'C-Consciousness'.
Leader of faction. Duty. Avoid him.
A leader of faction Duty. Avoid him.
Experienced Stalker. Keeps Your Eyes Open.
Leader of faction. Duty. Avoid him.
Leader of faction. Duty. Avoid him.
Guard at the mobile science camp.
Unknown Mercenary. Apparently in the Zone recently.
Unknown Mercenary. Apparently in the Zone recently.
Unknown Mercenary. Apparently in the Zone recently.
Unknown Mercenary. Apparently in the Zone recently.
Unknown Mercenary. Well Armed And Very Dangerous.
Unknown Mercenary. Well Armed And Very Dangerous.
Known In The Entire Zone Informant And The Informant.
A Leader Stalker from faction Monolith.
Lefty Is A Leader In Faction Monolith
Righty Is A Leader In Faction Monolith
Leader of faction Of Monolith. It is best to stay away from him.
Leader of faction Of Monolith. It is best to stay away from him.
Military Stalker. Well Armed And Very Dangerous.
Military Veteran Stalker. Well trained and dangerous.
Military Veteran Stalker. Well trained and dangerous.
Military Stalker. Well trained and dangerous.
One of the countless soldiers sent to protect the Zone.
Kuzin S. Vaska, or simply Stack.
Unusually calm. Was trained in anti-terrorist faction 'Swat'.
Just a huckster. Use to sell vacuum cleaners.
Rookie. Now two days in the Zone.
Rookie. Arrived in the Zone today.
One of the Veterans of the Zone. Well Equipped And Very Dangerous.
One of the Veterans of the Zone. Well Equipped And Very Dangerous.
One of the Veterans of the Zone. Well Equipped And Very Dangerous.
One of the Veterans of the Zone. Well Equipped And Very Dangerous.
One of the Veterans of the Zone. Well Equipped And Very Dangerous.
A Former Black Beret. Served In The Special Forces Brigade.
Goblin, So His Brother Nicknamed him. Came To The Area To Young Idealist.
Smuggler With Experience. For A Long Time Hunted In Africa And South America.
Former Afghan soldier. During one of the Ambushes Mujahedin Found Religion.
In everyday life, Phlegmatic, does not express his emotions.
Only 20 years old. Has no family.
Furious, Angry, Rude, Selfish, Cruel, Unfeeling, Cold.
Ham, Sycophant, A Hypocrite, A Coward.
Sparrow 27 Years. Cunning, Shrewd But Sometimes Makes Blunders.
Guard of Lukash the leader of the faction Freedom.
Guard of Lukash the leader of the faction Freedom.
Guard of Lukash the leader of the faction Freedom.
Leader of faction Of Freedom. Fanatically Loyal. Very Dangerous.
Leader of faction Of Freedom. Fanatically Loyal. Very Dangerous.
Known for his greed and obstinacy. They say he can get anything.
Stalker faction Freedom. The Commander of the Barrier.
One of the stalkers that has been unlucky.
One of the stalkers that has been unlucky.
One of the stalkers that has been unlucky.
One of the stalkers that has been unlucky.
One of the stalkers that has been unlucky.
One of the stalkers that has been unlucky.
One of the stalkers that has been unlucky.
One of the stalkers that has been unlucky.
One of the stalkers that has been unlucky.
One of the stalkers that has been unlucky.
One of the stalkers that has been unlucky.
One of the stalkers that has been unlucky.
